sphinx >= 1.6.2, < 2

[dev]
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.2.0, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2
pytest-runner >= 2.11, < 3
pytest >= 3.1.2, < 4
pytest-mock >= 0.6, < 1
pytest-catchlog >= 1, < 2
pytest-xdist >= 1.1, < 2
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3

[doc]
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.2.0, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2

[test]
pytest-runner >= 2.11, < 3
pytest >= 3.1.2, < 4
pytest-mock >= 0.6, < 1
pytest-catchlog >= 1, < 2
pytest-xdist >= 1.1, < 2
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3
